availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alonzo D. Lyter (Harrison County, Ky, farmhand and farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Mary Rankin. Stepson of Thomas A. Rankin. Married to Ann Maria Terry Lyter in Harrison County, Kentucky, on November 17, 1863. Farmhand in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 481.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #001690281.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Harrison County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 260, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Alonzo Daniel Lyter (1842-1910)," Memorial #53838128, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/53838128 (accessed February 6, 2020).
